name: Pika-Pi Bot
description: An Open-source PyTgCalls based Pyrogram bot to play music in voice chats

BOT_TOKEN.description: Make a bot at http://telegram.dog/BotFather and get the token of your bot.

BOT_NAME.description: Your Bot Name. By default it is 𝕷𝖊𝖌𝖊𝖓𝖉𝖘

SUDO_USERS.description: List of ID of those who can pause, stop and clear queue,separated by space.

DURATION_LIMIT.description: Maximum duration of songs that users can request(in minutes).
